positive.explanation: Consultants effectively maintain momentum through clear next steps and specific timelines
positive.explanation1: Strong demonstration of program-career alignment through specific examples and graduate outcomes
positive.explanation2: Effective balance of urgency and support when managing enrollment deadlines

improvement.explanation: Enhanced connection needed to support services including disability, financial, and academic assistance
improvement.explanation1: Stronger process control required for managing documentation requirements including specific alternatives
improvement.explanation2: More explicit focus needed on obtaining verbal enrollment agreements and confirming specific next actions

conversations.title: Effective Timeline Management
conversations.consultant_close_attempt: So our close of enrolments is today, but we're going to be working over the weekend and we will be able to get you a spot
conversations.student_response: I think last time we spoke you mentioned you were going to try and get your transcripts from Bond
conversations.consultant_adaptation: We'll get that resume sent to you now. And then if you want to return it to us even by later today so that when you come in tomorrow, we'll be able to do your enrollment
conversations.recommended_improvement: Add specific confirmation request: 'Can I confirm you'll complete the resume today so we can secure your spot for tomorrow's enrollment?'

goal_setting.title: Effective Timeline Management
goal_setting.consultant_close_attempt: The consultant initiated urgency while maintaining support, creating environment for immediate action
goal_setting.student_response: The student showed documentation concerns that needed immediate resolution
goal_setting.consultant_adaptation: The consultant provided clear next steps while maintaining momentum
goal_setting.recommended_improvement: Should have secured specific commitment with exact times for document submission and enrollment completion
